statements: DELETE FROM service_tickets WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM service_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1001 AND status = 'Open';
DELETE FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'Resolved' OR (customer_name = 'John Doe' AND issue_description LIKE '%network%');
DELETE FROM ticket_updates WHERE ticket_id = 10 AND updated_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1000 AND status = 'OPEN';
DELETE FROM resolutions WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' AND resolution_notes LIKE '%resolved%';
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 202 AND status = 'Resolved';
